name: Pet Shoppe
description:
A very peculiar pet shop in a very peculiar neighborhood. Create and splice over 62,000 combinations of abominations and sell them to children. Theoretically infinite gameplay!

Music by kfaraday, used under https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/

Uses mouse, wasd, and f/enter for controls. Click on the sliders to adjust DNA levels on the recombinator.
